wikipedia_page.main: Charles Hegan Myles (30 December 1837 – 23 February 1903) was a politician in the British colony of South Australia.

link_mentions.page: Members of the South Australian House of Assembly, 1871–1875

response: Samuel Marshall (15 Jun 1803 – 28 March 1879) married Jane Myles (21 December 1816 – 7 November 1879) around 1847. She was his second wife, and the oldest sister of Charles Myles MP (1837–1903).
